school_name: The Little Angels Public Higher Secondary school
tagline: A Project by MK Group of Companies
receipt_footer: Thank you for being a valued part of our school community. Please keep this receipt for your records.
All dues must be cleared before the due date. Late payments may be subject to a fine according to school rules.
This is an official fee receipt. Please retain for future reference.
We appreciate your trust in our institution. For queries, contact the school office during working hours.
